mapper.select: select COLUMN_NAME 'fieldName',column_comment 'fieldComment',column_type 'fieldType' from information_schema.columns where table_schema='itsm' and table_name=#{_parameter};

select t.id, t.status, t.instance_id as instanceId, t.event_title, t.org_flag, t.report_org, t.report_person, t.report_phone, t.assigned_group, t.assigned_person, t.event_source, t.inf_level, t.event_priority, t.side_flag, t.finance_flag, t.urgent_flag, t.event_title, t.event_info, t.system_name, t.complain_flag, t.init_first_level, t.init_second_level, t.init_three_level, t.inf_level, t.target_resolve_date, t.second_solve_plan, t.solve_plan, t.event_reason_category, t.event_source_system, t.relational_system, t.event_category, t.event_subclass, t.event_entry, t.event_subentry1, t.event_subentry2, t.final_first_level, t.final_second_level, t.final_three_level, t.change_flag, t.change_no, t.inf_face, t.inf_use, t.inf_system, t.inf_time_range, t.second_deal_org, t.second_deal_person, t.solution_valid_flag, t.close_code, t.event_level, t.extra1 as imCode from ${tableName} t
and t.extra1 = #{imCode}

update ${tableName}
status = #{params.status},
event_priority = #{params.eventPriority},
target_resolve_date = #{params.targetResolveDate},
extra5 = null,
final_first_level = #{params.finalFirstLevel},
solve_plan = #{params.solvePlan},
where id=#{params.bizId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.instance_id,a.extra1,a.status,(CASE b.type WHEN '1' THEN '普通变更' WHEN '2' THEN '紧急变更' WHEN '3' THEN '评审变更' ELSE '' END) changeType FROM `design_biz_changetask` a INNER JOIN design_biz_change b on a.changeNo=b.extra1 and a.approval =#{userId} and a.instance_id !=null
